scenario_text.value: Things are starting to get thick with fog.

Yeah, that must be because we’re getting
close to the Master.

Does that mean...the Kenzoku or some other
monsters could show up at any time?
Most likely. Let’s all proceed with caution.

Hm? That’s odd... I’m not getting the scent
of any enemies.
What do you mean? Are they all hiding?

I don’t know, but at the very least, there
aren’t any enemies nearby.
Yeah, I’m not sensing anything either.
So, what the hell? Is this just ordinary fog?

Hmph, quit freaking yourselves out. All we
gotta do is keep moving.

Not so fast! This could be a trap. And even
if it’s not, we should still be careful.

I agree. Hurrying on ahead now won’t make
much difference. Let’s move cautiously.

You got that, Kaito? Don’t you go running off
on your own, either!
All right, let’s keep moving carefully.
